meanings.definition: The condition of having a long head shape.
meanings.sent1: Some people with dolichocephalies may find it hard to wear certain hats.
meanings.sent2: The doctor studied the dolichocephalies of the ancient skulls.
meanings.sent3: At the costume party, his dolichocephalies made him the perfect alien.
meanings.sent4: Her dolichocephalies stood out in the crowd like a lighthouse in the dark.
meanings.sent5: The dolichocephalies of the giraffe help it reach leaves high up in the trees.

meanings.definition: The study or classification of individuals with long head shapes.
meanings.sent1: Research in dolichocephalies helps us understand ancient populations better.
meanings.sent2: Anthropologists specialize in the dolichocephalies of different groups.
meanings.sent3: The museum exhibit on dolichocephalies was both informative and fascinating.
meanings.sent4: In the world of fashion, dolichocephalies play a role in designing headwear.
meanings.sent5: The dolichocephalies of certain tribes are unique and intriguing to researchers.
